Diary.title: Private Diary
Diary.phrase3: “Because putting it into words, helps to let go”
Diary.text: With I.Z.I you have a private and safe diary. Write freely and save memories for your future self

Diary-Tabs.tab1-text:
Write every day. Annotate your thoughts, feelings and secrets without worries.

Everything is safely saved and encrypted in the cloud. No one but you can read what you write on the diary.

Get suggestions and recommendations from ZANA. An AI helper that gets to know you better, and helps you keep going.
Diary-Tabs.tab2-text:
With I.Z.I Premium you get to choose from different visual styles and fonts to better reflect your personality to your diary.

Get everything from the free version plus:
Diary-Tabs.tab2-li1: More space to write your thoughts.
